home.title: Hello, my name is Luiz Normanha and I'm a Software Developer
home.subtitle: I'm a developer based in Brazil, passionate with all things related to programming, working mainly with Front-end Development using React and React Native.

profile.label: Profile
description: Hi there, I'm Luiz! As a developer, I continuously strive to discover the most effective patterns and methods for crafting clean, readable code that's easily understood by my teammates
I am highly motivated to support my team in achieving its objectives and providing any necessary assistance along the way
I firmly believe that in a team environment, we all learn and grow together throughout the journey. :)

background.label: Background
description: I have been working as a Front-end Developer since 2018, focusing on React / React Native, using JS and TS. In my journey, I have worked on various types of projects, from the conception of projects from scratch to the maintenance of large projects in production.
I also have knowledge in Back-end and CI/CD, and I am always willing to learn new technologies that are necessary to deliver various types of projects.
